name: Animals World - QUIZ GAME FOR KIDS
name_original: Animals World - QUIZ GAME FOR KIDS
description:
Welcome to our exciting 2D game designed for kids! In this game, your child will have the opportunity to discover and learn about various animals in a fun and interactive way.

The game is simple to play, your child needs to scratch a card to reveal an animal picture below it. After revealing the animal, they need to order the letters correctly to make the animal's name. This will not only help improve their spelling but also improve their cognitive and problem-solving skills.

Our game features several animals, each with unique characteristics and features, making it a fun and engaging way for your child to learn about different animals. Additionally, the game is designed to be very enjoyable, with colorful graphics and lively sound effects to keep your child engaged and entertained.

We believe that our game will provide your child with an enjoyable learning experience that they will cherish and remember for years to come. Give it a try and watch as your child becomes an expert at naming different animals while having fun!
